</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 19</row>

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [disrupting](/Equipment.aspx?ID=294) [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)_ has a single strip of anointed leather wrapped around its hilt in a spiral pattern. The handle of the whip ends in an oak spike that has been sanctified with ashes from [Pharasma's](/Deities.aspx?ID=14) [Boneyard](/Planes.aspx?ID=15). If the spike is used to stake a [vampire](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=97) that's vulnerable to being staked, the vampire is immediately destroyed, without having to sever its head and anoint it with [_holy water_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=245). If the whip is buried with a creature, that creature can't rise as an [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) as long as the whip remains by its side.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Lady's Spiral
